note:
Drawn to Mastodon by the possibility that social media could be humane and personal, or at least that it could be more than an algorithmically "curated" heap of broken images.

Profile image description: A middle-distance photo of the late-day shadows of three people on grass.

Header image description: A panoramic photo from the top of Combe Gibbet (West Berkshire) on a clear sunny day.
